Title: Ouro Kronii
GameText: Power - Warden of Time: Ouro Kronii deals 1 target X melee damage, where X is the number of cards you have played this turn plus 1.

- One player may skip one of their turn phases on their next turn.
- One player may repeat one of their turn phases on their next turn.
- Ask a player what time it is, then they may play a card.

Title: Blessings of Time
GameText:
3 Hero characters may deal themselves 2 fixed psychic damage each.
Ouro Kronii regains 1 HP for each character dealt damage this way.
Each Hero character dealt damage this way may use 1 power.
Quote: Yes, I seek it, I seek it                The memory of the days when things were

Title: Boros
GameText:
When Ouro Kronii would deal herself fixed psychic damage, you may prevent it. If you do, this card deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage.
START PHASE
This card regains 2 HP.
Quote: "By the way, Boros says hi. (He doesn't know what's going on.)"

Title: Gwak!!
GameText:
If you have played 3 or more cards this turn, discard 1 card.
Otherwise, shuffle your trash into your deck and collect 1 Burst card.
Quote: "I don't rage over a game, that's nonsense. What could could ever hurt me? ... Gwak! GWAKKKK!"

Title: Harsh Warden
GameText:
After a target is dealt damage by Ouro Kronii, if it has 3 or fewer HP, you may destroy it. If you do, draw 1 card.
START PHASE
You may draw 2 cards. If you do, destroy this card.
Quote: If you want to blame someone, blame your own fate. You should know by now... that this world... is beyond salvation.

Title: Kroniichiwa
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
Collect 1 Limited card.
Play 1 card.

Title: Kroniicopter
GameText:
After this card is played, you and 1 ally Hero each draw 2 cards.
When this card is destroyed, you may shuffle your trash into your deck and draw 1 card.
REACTION: Salvage 1 card. Destroy this card.

Title: My Own Time
GameText:
START PHASE
Destroy this card.
PLAY PHASE 
You may play any number of cards this phase. 
After you play a card this phase, Ouro Kronii deals herself 1 fixed psychic damage.
Quote: "I have all the time in the world, I don't see why I have to be rushed for it."

Title: Only the Clock Will Tell
GameText:
Reveal the top two cards of the Villain deck.
If you have played 3 or more cards this turn, you may discard or bury any number of the revealed cards, then replace the rest in any order.
Otherwise, replace the revealed cards in any order.
Quote: Humanity clings to the past and nostalgia                     Will they ever escape                                  from the chains of time?                Only the clock will tell

Title: Past Its Time
GameText:
Destroy 1 Ongoing card or 1 target with 5 or fewer HP. 
If you played 3 or more cards this turn, you may destroy another Ongoing card, or 1 target with 5 or fewer HP.
Quote: "People age cheese, wine, why not sandwiches?"

Title: Take Your Time
GameText:
Play this in an ally Hero's play area.
END PHASE
That Hero may take their PLAY PHASE, POWER PHASE, or DRAW PHASE. If they do, Ouro Kronii deals that Hero character 2 fixed psychic damage, then destroy this card.

Title: The Council - Time
GameText:
During a Hero's END PHASE, if they skipped at least one phase that turn, they may draw 1 card.
After the first time you play a card each turn, draw 1 card. 
POWER: Play 1 card.

Title: Time Blades
GameText:
This card's power deals +1 damage for each card played during your turn. 
POWER: Ouro Kronii deals 1 target 2 melee damage. If you have played 3 or more cards this turn, Ouro Kronii may deal 1 second target 1 melee damage.
Quote: "So, these are my swords. If you guys don't listen, you'll be made into shish-kabobs."

Title: Time Slash
GameText:
If you have played 3 or more cards this turn, Ouro Kronii deals 1 target 4 melee damage.
Otherwise, Ouro Kronii deals 1 target 2 melee damage.
Quote: "What did I ever do to Ame?"           "Time, lore, you gave her a watch? I dunno."

Title: Unshakeable Confidence
GameText:
PLAY PHASE
You may play an additional card this phase.
END PHASE
If you played at least two cards this turn, draw 1 card.
Otherwise, destroy this card.
Quote: "I pray to myself and no one else! Look in the mirror, Kronii, god you're so beautiful!"

Title: Unwind Time
GameText:
Each ally Hero may salvage 1 card.
If you have played 3 or more cards this turn, Ouro Kronii regains 3 HP.
Quote: "You have multiple lives to spare, right?"
